net.hockeyapp.android.utils

Class SimpleMultipartEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hockeyapp.android.utils.SimpleMultipartEntity

  • public class SimpleMultipartEntity
extends java.lang.Object

    Description

    To avoid external apache library "httpmime" this is a simple implementation for a MultipartEntity. Please note that first all key value pairs have to be written and then at least one file part has to be added. Otherwise the boundaries are not written correctly.
